entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
